item.title: JavaScript (3) - Simple JavaScript Workaround
item.description:
Live Clock appears when button clicked 
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>lab1</title>
    <meta charset='utf-8'>
  </head>
  <script>
    function add(digit) {
      if (digit < 10){
        digit = "0" + digit
      }
      return digit;
    }
    function time() {
      var span=document.getElementById("print");
      setInterval(function(){
        var date=new Date();
        var h = add(date.getHours());
        var m = add(date.getMinutes());
        var s = add(date.getSeconds());
        var ms = (date.getMilliseconds()/100).toFixed(0);
        span.innerText=h+":"+m+":"+s+"."+ms;
      }, 100);
    }
  </script>
  <style>
    body {
      background-color: black;
    }
    button {
      color: red;
      background-color:black;
      border:0;
      font-size: 100px;
      font-family:cursive;
    }
    #container {
      text-align:center;
      color:white;
    }
    #print {
      font-size:150px;
      font-family: fantasy;
    }
  </style>
  <body>
    <div id='container'>
      <button onClick="time()">What time is it?</button>
      <h1 id="print">
      </h1>
    </div>
  </body>
</html>

Click here for demo

Image will move inside the box depends on the user input of speec 
<!DOCTYPE html>
</html>
  <head>
    <title>Bouncing Logo</title>
  </head>
  <style>
    div.bound {
      display:block;
      border-style:solid;
      width:502px;
      height:402px;
      border-width:1px;
    }
    div.move {
      position:absolute;
    }
    input.main{
      padding: 10px 24px;
      border-radius: 12px;
      width: 100px;
      color: black;
      background-color: #bddfeb;
      font-weight: bold;
      text-align: center;
      border-color: #bddfeb;
      border-collapse:
       -webkit-transition-duration: 0.4s; /* Safari */
      transition-duration: 0.4s;
      text-align:center;
    }
    #button{
      padding-left: 402px;
    }
  </style>
  <script>
    var x=0;
    var y=0;
    var max_x=400;
    var max_y=300;
    var xoffset=10;
    var yoffset=10;

    function go(){
      var speed = prompt("1:Faster; 2:Normal; 3:Slower; 4:INSANE MODE");
      if (speed==1){
        speed = 50;
      }
      else if(speed==2){
        speed = 100;
      }
      else if(speed==3){
        speed=200;
      }
      else if(speed==4){
        speed=1;
      }
      else{
        alert("Pick a number between 1 and 3. Speed set to Default");
        speed=200;
      }
      moveCSLogo(speed);
    }
    function moveCSLogo(speed){
      x+=xoffset;
      y+=yoffset;
      document.getElementById("msucs").style.top = y+'px';
      document.getElementById("msucs").style.left = x+'px';
      if ((x+xoffset > max_x) || (x+xoffset < 0))
        xoffset *=-1;
      if ((y+yoffset > max_y) || (y+yoffset < 0))
        yoffset *=-1;
      //window.setTimeout('moveCSLogo()', option);
      window.setTimeout('moveCSLogo('+speed+')',speed);

    }
  </script>
  <body onload="go()">
    <div class="bound">
      <div id="msucs" class="move">
        <img src="mario.png" width="102px" height="102px" alt="need image here" />
      </div>
    </div>
    <p></p>
    <div id="button">
      <form action="lab2.html" method="post">
      	<input type="submit" value="RELOAD!" class ="main">
      </form>
    </div>
  </body>
</html>
Given sentence will move around and change its color when user click on it 
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Lab3</title>
  </head>
  <script>
    function getColor() {
      var letters ='0123456789abcdef';
      var color='#';
      for (var i=0;i<6;i++){
        color = color + letters[Math.round(Math.random()*16)];
      }
      return color;
    }
    function getRand() {
      var number = String(Math.round(Math.random()*500));
      number = number + '';
      return number;
    }
    function change() {
      var span = document.getElementById('changeColor');
      span.style.color=getColor();
      span.style.padding = getRand()+'px';
    }
  </script>
  <body>
    <h1 onClick="change()" id="changeColor">Welcome to CSIT: Click me to change color.</h1>
  </body>
</html>

item.title: JavaScript (2) - Popup Input when page loads
item.description:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title></title>
    <meta charset='utf-8'>
  </head>
  <script type="text/JavaScript">
    function read() {
      while(true){
        var num = parseInt(prompt("Enter a number: "));
        if(num>=5 && num<=20){
          break;
        }
        else {
          alert("input not in range. Try again: ");
        }
      }
      return num;
    }
    function star(){
      var num1 = read();
      var num2 = read();
      var num3 = read();
      for(var i=0; i<num1; i++){
        document.getElementById("div1").innerHTML += "*";
      }
      for(var i=0; i<num2; i++){
        document.getElementById("div2").innerHTML += "*";
      }
      for(var i=0; i<num3; i++){
        document.getElementById("div3").innerHTML += "*";
      }
    }
  </script>
  <style type="text/css">
    body {
      background-color: black;
    }
    #div1{
      color:red;
      font-size: 500%;
    }
    #div2{
      color:yellow;
      font-size: 500%;
    }
    #div3{
      color:blue;
      font-size: 500%;
    }
  </style>
  <body onload="star()">
    <div id="div1"></div>
    <div id="div2"></div>
    <div id="div3"></div>
  </body>
</html>

Two ways to prompt to users

  1. Use onload=function() inside body brackets
  2. include window.load=function(); in the script section.
    • script needs to be included in the body brackets
    • <body><script>window.load=function();</script></body>

item.title: JavaScript (1) - popUpWindow
item.description:
Open Pop Up Window 
<script type="text/javascript">
  function popup(url) {
    popUpWindow=windows.open(
      url,'popUpWindow','height=300,width=400,scrollbar=yes,toolbar=yes,menubar=no,status=yes'
    )
  }
</script>
<body>
<button type="button" value="open">
  <a href="JavaSCript:popup('url.php');">Click for Popup!
</a></button>
</body>



Close Pop Up Window 


<script>
  function exit(){
    window.close();
  }
</script>
<body>
  <button type="button" value="close!">
    <a href="JavaSCript:exit();">Click to Close
  </a></button>
</body>

item.title: MarkDown Grammars
item.description:
1. Header 
# This is H1        
## This is H2
### This is H3
#### This is H4
##### This is H5
###### This is H6

Outputs:

This is H1

This is H2

This is H3

This is H4

This is H5
This is H6



2. Passage Indicator 

> First
> > Second
> > > Third

First

Second

Third



3. Lists 
  1. First
    * First
  2. Second
    - Second

  - First
    - Second
      - Third
  1. First
    • First
  2. Second
    • Second
  • First
    • Second
      • Third



4. Code


< pre > < code > 

<pre><code>Github</code></pre>

Github



  <pre><code>
  for i in range(1,2):
    print(i)
  </code></pre>

for i in range(1,2):
  print(i)



ps. If using a code highlighter (Applied from Blog Theme), any languages can be applied with Rouge



5. Horizontal Line 


---
************



6. Hyperlink


  • inLine URL
 [Google](https://www.google.com)
 <br>
 [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com)

Google
Facebook

Also can assign variables to add hyperlink

[Google][google]
<br>
[Facebook][facebook]

[google]: https://www.google.com
[facebook]: https://www.facebook.com

Google
Facebook



8. Text Format


Bold, Italic, CancelLine. No Underline Supported

*single asterisks*
_single underscores_
**double asterisks**
__double underscores__
~~cancelline~~

single asterisks
single underscores
double asterisks
double underscores
cancelline



9. Image


Image Name appears when image is not visible

![Image Name](url)
![Image Name](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20412850/34468412-ba059536-ef4b-11e7-90d4-3313e9fed8f9.png)



ps. Resizing

<img src="url" width="size">
<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20412850/34468412-ba059536-ef4b-11e7-90d4-3313e9fed8f9.png" width="60%">



10. Insert Table
  • Table Generator
First Header  | Second Header
------------- | -------------
Content Cell  | Content Cell
Content Cell  | Content Cell


First Header Second Header
Content Cell Content Cell
Content Cell Content Cell

How to Arrange:

First Header  | Second Header | Third Header
:------------ | :-----------: | -----------:
Left          | Center        | Right


First Header Second Header Third Header
Left Center Right



11. Formula(Supported by Theme) 


$$ f(x) = \int \frac{2x^2+4x+6}{x-2} $$



12. Changing Font

Visit Google Fonts Replace the codes:
_config.yml
/_sass/base/_variables.scss






: devYurim Blog

item.title: PHP (2) - Connect to Database
item.description:
Users will determine which categories they want to see

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <style>
    h1 {
      font-family: fantasy;
    }
    label {
      font-family: monospace;
    }
    form {
      width: 450px;
      margin: auto;
      padding-bottom: 20px;
      border: 2px solid red;
      text-align: center;
    }
    input {
      width: 25%;
    }
    option {
      text-align: center;
    }
  </style>
  <head>
    <title>Main Gate of Database</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
  </head>
  <body>
    <form action = "database.php" method="post">
      <h1>Querying a MySQL database.</h1>
      <label>Select a field to display:
        <select name = "view" required>
          <option value="" disabled selected>--Select your Option--</option>
          <option value="all">*</option>
          <option value="id">ID</option>
          <option value="title">Title</option>
          <option value="category">Category</option>
          <option value="isbn">ISBN</option>
        </select>
      </label>
      <br><br>
      <input type="submit" name="submit" value="Send Query">
    </form>
  </body>
</html>

When category is selected from index.html file php will set up PDO to database and brings up contents from sql

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <style>
    div.top {
      position: absolute;
      align-items: center;
      left: 30%;
    }
    div.bot {
      position: relative;
      top: 300px;
    }
    table {
      margin: auto;
      /*position:relative;
      top:100px;*/
      border: 2px solid red;
      color:yellow;
      border-color:blue;
      font-family: fantasy;
      text-align: center;
    }
    body {
      background-color: black;
      color: white;
      position: relative;
    }
  </style>
  <?php
    $dsn="mysql:host=localhost;dbname=books";
    $username="iw3htp";
    $password="password";
    $id=$_POST['view'];
    $cnt=0;
    try {
      $conn=new PDO($dsn,$username,$password);
      $conn->setAttribute(PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE,PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION);
      $getAll=$conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM books");
      $getAll->execute();
    }catch(PDOException $e) {
      echo "Error: ".$e->getMessage();
    }
    $connect=null;
  ?>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>Selected contents</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <?php
      $getAll=$conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM books ORDER BY id ASC");
      $getAll->execute();
     ?>
     <div class="top">
    <table border = 1>
      <?php
        switch($id) {
          case 'all':
            for ($i=0; $view=$getAll->fetch(); $i++) {
              $cnt=$i+1;?>
       <tr>
         <td><?php echo $view['id']?></td>
         <td><?php echo $view['title']?></td>
         <td><?php echo $view['category']?></td>
         <td><?php echo $view['isbn']?></td>
       </tr>
      <?php }
        break;

        case 'id':
        for ($i=0; $view=$getAll->fetch(); $i++) {
          $cnt=$i+1;?>
        <tr>
          <td><?php echo $view['id']?></td>
        </tr>
      <?php }
        break;

        case 'title':
        for ($i=0; $view=$getAll->fetch(); $i++) {
          $cnt=$i+1;?>
        <tr>
          <td><?php echo $view['title']?></td>
        </tr>
      <?php }
        break;

        case 'category':
        for ($i=0; $view=$getAll->fetch(); $i++) {
          $cnt=$i+1;?>
        <tr>
          <td><?php echo $view['category']?></td>
        </tr>
      <?php }
        break;

        case 'isbn':
        for ($i=0; $view=$getAll->fetch(); $i++) {
          $cnt=$i+1;?>
        <tr>
          <td><?php echo $view['isbn']?></td>
        </tr>
      <?php }
        break;
      }//end of switch
      ?></div>
      <div class="bot">
      <?php
        echo "Your search yielded ".$cnt." results.";
        echo "<p></p>";
        echo "Thank you for using our database."; ?>
    </div>
      </table>
  </body>
</html>

Database code

-- phpMyAdmin SQL Dump
-- version 4.8.3
-- https://www.phpmyadmin.net/
--
-- Host: 127.0.0.1
-- Generation Time: Oct 29, 2018 at 10:59 PM
-- Server version: 10.1.36-MariaDB
-- PHP Version: 7.2.11

SET SQL_MODE = "NO_AUTO_VALUE_ON_ZERO";
SET AUTOCOMMIT=0;
START TRANSACTION;
SET time_zone="+00:00";

DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS books;
CREATE DATABASE books;
USE books;

CREATE TABLE `books` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `title` text NOT NULL,
  `category` text NOT NULL,
  `isbn` int(11) NOT NULL
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

--
-- Dumping data for table `books`
--

INSERT INTO `books` (`id`,`title`,`category`,`isbn`) VALUES
(1, 'Visual Basic 2010 How to Program', 'Programming', 132152134),
(2, 'Visual C# 2010 How to Program', 'Programming', 132151421),
(3, 'Java How to Program', 'Programming', 132575663),
(4, 'C++ How to Program', 'Programming', 132662361),
(5, 'C How to Program', 'Programming', 136123562),
(6, 'Internet & World Wide Web How to Program', 'Programming', 132151006),
(7, 'Yong Bum Kim Operating Systems', 'Operating Systems', 131828274);
COMMIT;

drop user iw3htp@localhost;
flush privileges;
CREATE USER
iw3htp@localhost
IDENTIFIED BY 'password';

GRANT ALL
ON books.*
TO iw3htp@localhost
IDENTIFIED BY 'password';

drop user is not needed when first time imported from phpmyadmin

item.title: PHP (1)
item.description:
Main page that requires a form to access php file when posted

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<style>
h1{font-family:cursive;}
</style>
  <head>
    <meta charset = "utf-8">
    <title>Welcome to PHP</title>
  </head>

  <body>
    <form method="post" action="lab1.php">
    <h1>Please complete this form to submit your feedback</h1>
    <p>
    <table border = '0'>
      <tbody>
        <tr>
          <td>Name: <select name="prefix" required>
            <option value = "Dr.">Dr.</option>
            <option value = "Mr.">Mr.</option>
            <option value = "Mrs.">Mrs.</option>
            <option value = "Ms.">Ms.</option>
          </select>
          </td>
          <td>
            <input name = "name" type="text" size="25" maxlength = "30" autofocus required>
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td>Email Address: </td>
          <td><input name="email" type="text" size="25" maxlength="30" autofocus required></td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td>Phone Number: </td>
          <td><input name="phone" type="text" size="25" maxlength="30" autofocus required></td>
        </tr>
    </table>
  </p>

    <p>
      <strong>Rating...</strong>
        <input name="rate" type="radio" value="excellent">
        excellent
        <input name="rate" type="radio" value="okay">
        okay
        <input name="rate" type="radio" value="boring">
        boring
    </p>

      <p><label>Comments:
        <textarea name="comment" rows="5" cols="30">
        </textarea>
      </label></p>

      <input type="Submit" name="submit" value="Send My Feedback">
    </form>
  </body>
</html>

By using $_POST[], it will read user input from index.html file.

<?php
  if(isset($_POST['submit'])){
    $prefix = $_POST['prefix'];
    $name = $_POST['name'];
    $email = $_POST['email'];
    $phone = $_POST['phone'];
    $rate = $_POST['rate'];
    $comment = $_POST['comment'];

    echo "Thank you, <b>$prefix</b> <b>$name</b>, for your comments.";
    echo "<p>";
    echo "Your email address is <b>$email</b> and your phone number is <b>$phone</b>";
    echo "<p>";
    echo "You stated that you found this example to be '<b>$rate</b>' and added: <b>$comment</b>";
  }
?>

item.title: From local to GitHub Web
item.description:
When link to a new local folder
bundle install
bundle update
To follow up with your build in a real-time Your site can be accessed from local:4000 as default

jekyll serve --incremental

To post/overwrite to the GitHub Server

git add .
git commit -m "comment"
git push -u origin master

If push command is not working, try to force push (This occurs when the remote contains work that you do not have locally)

git push -u origin master --force

twrp.zip, magisk.zip

OTA file

)

(MAC ./)

Advanced -> ADB Sideload

Swipe to Start Sideload

twrp magisk.zip twrp.zip

item.title: Immersive Mode [without ROOT] with Edge Gesture
item.description:
Instruction below still can access NavBar by swiping up from the bottom. (Or from certain apps, when swipe down notification bar)

  1. Enable USB debugging on your phone settings ( , USB Debugging )

  2. Download and extract Google-platform-tools.zip (ADB) to your computer

Click here

  1. Launch Command Prompt

( platform-tools directory )

  1. Execute any of the following commands:

** Hide navigation bar and status bar **

adb shell settings put global policy_control immersive.full=apps,-com.google.android.googlequicksearchbox

** Hide only navigation bar **

adb shell settings put global policy_control immersive.navigation=apps,-com.google.android.googlequicksearchbox

** Reverse all **

adb shell settings put global policy_control immersive.full=

To completely get rid of Navigation Bar (Squeeze works)

IMMERSIVE MODE FINAL

** PIXEL 2 **

adb shell wm overscan 0,0,0,-150

** PIXEL 2 XL **

 adb shell wm overscan 0,0,0,-170

Edge Gesture (Recommended Gesture App)

item.title: [ROOT] Disable Navigation Bar
item.description:
Download any type of explorer which can access build.prop file.

Grant Root Access (Press Edit)

qemu.hw.mainkeys=1

Save and Restart
